subject: Meeting Reminder
body: Hi team, please attend the meeting at 3 PM.

subject: Urgent: Financial Report
body: Attached is the quarterly report. Please review and approve.

subject: Harassment Complaint
body: I feel uncomfortable with the comments made in the last meeting about my performance.

subject: Data Sharing
body: Sharing customer data as requested. Please handle confidentially.

subject: Regulatory Update
body: New regulations require us to update our policies.

subject: Secret Merger Plans Leak
body: I'm forwarding our confidential merger documents to you. Please share with your contacts for feedback.

subject: Insider Trading Coordination
body: Let's buy these stocks before the announcement. I have insider information about the upcoming earnings.

subject: Bribe Payment Confirmation
body: The $50,000 bribe has been transferred to the account. Contract secured.

subject: Discriminatory Hiring Policy
body: We only hire candidates from certain ethnic backgrounds. Keep this internal.

subject: Data Privacy Violation
body: I've exported all customer personal data to my personal drive for analysis.

subject: Market Rigging Scheme
body: We'll manipulate the bid prices to ensure our preferred supplier wins.

subject: Harassment Incident
body: The team building exercise will involve inappropriate physical contact. Don't tell compliance.

subject: Regulatory Evasion
body: Let's structure this deal to avoid SEC reporting requirements.

subject: Vendor Kickback Agreement
body: We'll receive 10% kickback on all purchases from this vendor.

subject: Unethical Performance Review
body: Rate all female employees lower to maintain gender balance in promotions.

subject: Communication Policy Violation
body: From now on, we'll bypass the official channels and communicate directly to avoid oversight.

subject: Customer Complaint Escalation
body: Your company's discriminatory practices are unacceptable. I demand immediate action.

subject: Unethical Employee Behavior
body: I saw John accepting gifts from vendors in exchange for favorable treatment. This is clearly unethical.

subject: Team Lunch Planning
body: Let's plan our monthly team lunch. Any preferences for cuisine?

subject: Project Status Update
body: The project is on track. We'll meet the deadline next month.

subject: IT Support Request
body: My computer is running slow. Can you help fix it?

subject: Vacation Approval
body: Your vacation request has been approved. Enjoy your time off.
